kw.name: Setup Driver

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Check Element Exists By Id
kw.doc: Vérifie si un élément existe en utilisant son ID.

kw.name: Should Be True
kw.doc: Fails if the given condition is not true.
